sentences.english: Heme , the prosthetic group of the hemoglobin, has been used widely and importantly.
sentences.chinese: 血红素是血红蛋白的辅基，有极其广泛和重要的应用。

sentences.english: Crystal base, foil glittering and translucent get rid of whole product extremely smart showily.
sentences.chinese: 水晶底座晶莹剔透，烘托整个产品极其醒目华贵。

sentences.english: They asked these questions very sincerely, never talked about anything metaphysically.
sentences.chinese: 向得极其虔诚，就是不谈玄虚。

sentences.english: That evening when she entered the theatre the manager had a most pleasant greeting for her.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，当她走进戏院时，经理极其和悦地招呼她。

sentences.english: It is exceedingly irresponsible of him to leave without saying goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 他这种不辞而别的行为是极其不负责的。
极其精致的女士贴身衬衫。

sentences.english: Drug and non-intravenous drug users in these two lines of defense is extremely fragile.
sentences.chinese: 戒毒和不静脉注射毒品这两道防线是极其脆弱的。

sentences.english: The fostering of imagination is vital in the children's drawing teaching.
sentences.chinese: 在儿童画教学中，想象力的培养是极其重要的。

sentences.english: Dangerous rock is a main geological hazard in the reservoir area of the Three Gorges Project, especially in Wanzhou area.
sentences.chinese: 三峡库区危岩灾害极其发育，万州地区具有代表性。

sentences.english: With great seriousness he pondered upon the problem.
sentences.chinese: 他极其严肃地仔细考虑问题。

sentences.english: In China it is rare to see a knife on the dinner table.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，餐桌上放一把刀是极其少见的现象。

sentences.english: Philology prevailed very much in Qing Dynasty and especially many top-ranking scholars ever studied it at that time.
sentences.chinese: 清代小学极其昌盛，第一流的学者对小学均多所研究。

sentences.english: His tone can be alarmingly inconsequential, as if the reader is there to be perpetually wrong-footed.
sentences.chinese: 他的语气极其不合逻辑，好像读者永远都站不对阵脚。

sentences.english: The microbiome is also proving critical in many aspects of health.
sentences.chinese: 微生物组也在健康的其他方面被证实为是极其重要的。

sentences.english: Sanitation Construction in Beibei was operated in quite hard conditions.
sentences.chinese: 北碚的卫生建设是在极其困苦的条件下开展的。

sentences.english: In the most serious frame of mind Pierre drove up to the old prince's house.
sentences.chinese: 皮埃尔怀着极其严肃的心情乘车去老公爵家。

definition: very/completely/utterly/extremely/absolutely/hundred percent/to divide into ten equal parts
